text: It is undecided which of primary radical trachelectomy or NACT followed by FST is superior to the other in women with proven cervical cancer $> 2 \ \mathrm { c m }$ .Rate of possible fertility preserving surgery and obstetrical outcomes seems superior after NACT compared to upfront radical trachelectomy.
